findings.message:
Log (0x7a8721a9d64c74da899424c1b52acbf58ddc9782.sol#64-89) contract sets array length with a user-controlled value:
	- History.push(LastMsg) (0x7a8721a9d64c74da899424c1b52acbf58ddc9782.sol#86)
findings.name: controlled-array-length

findings.message:
Reentrancy in PrivateDeposit.CashOut(uint256) (0x7a8721a9d64c74da899424c1b52acbf58ddc9782.sol#47-58):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (0x7a8721a9d64c74da899424c1b52acbf58ddc9782.sol#52)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances[msg.sender] -= _am (0x7a8721a9d64c74da899424c1b52acbf58ddc9782.sol#54)
	PrivateDeposit.balances (0x7a8721a9d64c74da899424c1b52acbf58ddc9782.sol#11) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- PrivateDeposit.CashOut(uint256) (0x7a8721a9d64c74da899424c1b52acbf58ddc9782.sol#47-58)
	- PrivateDeposit.Deposit() (0x7a8721a9d64c74da899424c1b52acbf58ddc9782.sol#36-45)
	- PrivateDeposit.balances (0x7a8721a9d64c74da899424c1b52acbf58ddc9782.sol#11)
findings.name: reentrancy-eth

findings.message:
Version constraint ^0.4.19 contains known severe issues (https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/latest/bugs.html)
	- DirtyBytesArrayToStorage
	- ABIDecodeTwoDimensionalArrayMemory
	- KeccakCaching
	- EmptyByteArrayCopy
	- DynamicArrayCleanup
	- ImplicitConstructorCallvalueCheck
	- TupleAssignmentMultiStackSlotComponents
	- MemoryArrayCreationOverflow
	- privateCanBeOverridden
	- SignedArrayStorageCopy
	- ABIEncoderV2StorageArrayWithMultiSlotElement
	- DynamicConstructorArgumentsClippedABIV2
	- UninitializedFunctionPointerInConstructor_0.4.x
	- IncorrectEventSignatureInLibraries_0.4.x
	- ABIEncoderV2PackedStorage_0.4.x
	- ExpExponentCleanup
	- EventStructWrongData
	- NestedArrayFunctionCallDecoder.
It is used by:
	- ^0.4.19 (0x7a8721a9d64c74da899424c1b52acbf58ddc9782.sol#7)
findings.name: solc-version

findings.message: solc-0.4.26 is an outdated solc version. Use a more recent version (at least 0.8.0), if possible.
findings.name: solc-version

findings.name: low-level-calls
